channel.title: Bachelors Degree!
channel.description:
Woot found out today that I will be receiving my BA degree from DeVry University next Tuesday for GML programming! The official degree will be in Game and Simulation Programming but its for game maker. Finally gosh! Took me 2 years! And before you say wtf they tech game maker and you can get an actual degree in it?!!! Yes they do. This is my teacher and Im in the GML class.
Andrew Kiebler Program Major: Game and Simulation Programming Expertise: C++, Math up to Pre-Calculus, [b]Game Maker[/b], Visual Logic, Comp 100 Hobbies/Affiliations: Dagda, Games, Food, Tutoring, Reading, etc.
You can see this link to know that Im not lying: http://www.crys.devry.edu/asc-tutors.html

item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

[quote=“noobs are ftw, post:37, topic:406349”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=503342.msg3682788#msg3682788 date=1311639855]

No offense, but DeVry is a diploma-farm school and really is quite shit.
edit: You could of gone to a more of a respectable school such as your state university, etc.

They probably don’t give degrees for something as shitty as GML.

You can get a degree in being an Indian Chief

Omg I’m so doing that! Then I can open a casino legally!
[/quote]

thats native american[/quote]

What else do you think “indian chief” would be referring to? The Punjabi-kee tribe?
